name: Checkbox
purpose: Allow the user to select or deselect one or more independent options.
useWhen: Selection does not imply immediate system state change
rules: Each checkbox represents an independent choice
Checkboxes may be part of a group or used individually
doNotUseWhen: Representing a system on/off state (use Switch)
Selecting exactly one option from a set (use RadioGroup)
User must search for options (use Combobox)
aiHints: Use Checkbox for selection, not system enablement
Checkbox does not imply immediate effect
